PoolSizeCalculator

public PoolSizeCalculator(int numPlayers,
                          int poolSize)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Calculates the number of pools of either size required to put all fencers into pools.

Parameters:
numPlayers - A non-negative integer representing the number of fencers to be placed into pools
poolSize - A non-negative integer representing the ideal number of fencers to be placed in each pool
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
